Instruction: Set the oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a large bowl, mix together ground beef, bread crumbs, onion, egg, and the seasoning mixture. Form into meatloaf and place in a baking dish.
Sprinkle chicken with olive oil, coating it evenly.
Pour lemon juice and olive oil mixture over the chicken.
Remove chicken from the oven, cover with aluminum foil, and let rest for 10 minutes before carving.
